author: Kathleen Gossman
title: The Helpers—Digital and IRL—Making a Difference During COVID-19
description: From Seattle to Boston and Minneapolis to Houston, people are sidestepping their routines and reaching out to one another. Here are helpers, digital and IRL, making a difference during these trying times.
content:
We're isolated, quarantined and socially distant. We're following the best medical advice, and, even if we're connecting with colleagues via Slack while working from home, we're anxious and stressed.
We know what the doctors say: Left unchecked, stress can i… [+4742 chars]
